english.segment1: It's six A.M. I'm so tired. The alarm sounds. And the new day begins. Before I go. And disturb this peaceful moment. I look to You
english.segment2: [CHORUS:]. I want to say a prayer. Before my feet can hit the ground. Lord I give this day to You
english.segment3: I'm amazed how You forgive me. Yesterday seems so far behind. It's a brand new day. And every day's a new beginning. I look to You
english.segment5: Breathe in. Breathe out. Breathe in. And watch the day begin. I wanna watch the day begin
